oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Safety & Contamination Information to Retailers regarding Control of Quality and Safety in Organic Production Chains
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ogden, Iain
Rosa, Eduardo
Wyss, Gabriela
Brandt, Kirsten
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Food security, food quality and human health
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This leaflet provides a practical overview for retailers of what is done to secure the safety and purity of 7 types of organically pro-duced foods, and what the retailers can do to support those efforts and preserve the food safety until purchase. Other leaflets for re-tailers cover authenticity and fraud or taste, freshness & nutrients, and separate leaflets aim at consumers or at production of specific commodities.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Forschungsinstitut für biologischen Landbau, CH-5070 Frick; University of Newcastle, UK-NE1 7RU,Newcastle upon Tyne
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Ogden, Iain; Rosa, Eduardo; Wyss, Gabriela and Brandt, Kirsten (2005) Safety & Contamination Information to Retailers regarding Control of Quality and Safety in Organic Production Chains. Organic HACCP, no. Nr. 5. Forschungsinstitut für biologischen Landbau, CH-5070 Frick; University of Newcastle, UK-NE1 7RU,Newcastle upon Tyne. [Unpublished]
